about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate about technology and sharing knowledge

story.title: My Story
story.paragraph1: I'm a passionate developer with over 5 years of experience in web development. My journey in tech started with a curiosity about how things work on the internet, which led me to learn programming and eventually become a full-stack developer.
story.paragraph2: I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and sharing knowledge with the developer community. This blog is my platform to share insights, tutorials, and experiences from my journey in tech.

current.title: Current Position
current.description: Currently working as a Senior Full Stack Developer, leading development teams and architecting modern web applications.

advanced.title: Advanced Studies
advanced.description: Pursued advanced studies in web development to enhance my skills.

first.title: First Developer Role
first.shortDescription: Junior Frontend Developer at Tech Corp
first.description: My first professional role as a developer where I worked on various client projects.
first.resp2: Collaborated with design and backend teams

start.title: Started Programming Journey
start.description: My journey in programming began with a deep curiosity about how websites work. I started with HTML and CSS, gradually moving on to JavaScript and modern frameworks.
start.milestone1: Completed online courses in web development
